name: Danger Duck v1
description:
The original Danger Duck Prototype

This is the original version of danger duck I made in 2013, One of my first games. Danger Duck plays for over 1000 jump makes or kills to get to the fifth world (this world has no ending). Danger Duck v1 should work on mobile but it is heavy with graphics motion and sound with no regard for order, so expect it to run slower.

This game is cancled as it was one of the first games with construct 2 there is a lot of heavy code for simple actions and lots of graphics layers that became very cumbersome before implementing the boss modes.

controls
    touchscreen buttons
    cut the screen in halfscreen
  • left side - jump | right side - Laser
    • keyboard
  • controls J - jump | L - Laser
